name: DOCKER_REGISTRY_SERVER_PASSWORD
_comment: This is the personal access token you created in the last step.

name: DOCKER_REGISTRY_SERVER_URL
_comment: This is the container registry URL of your GitHub account. It is same for all users.

name: PORT
_comment: This is the port number your app listens to. Only use 8080

name: JWT_SECRET
_comment: Random string of characters. You can use `openssl rand -hex 32` to generate one.

name: MODE
_comment: Set this to `dev` for development and `prod` for production.

name: NODE_ENV
_comment: Set this to `development` for development and `production` for production.

name: DATABASE_URL
_comment: This is the connection string to your PostgreSQL database. You can get this from the Azure portal. You need to provide this in prisma format. Example: postgres://user:password@host:port/database

name: REDIS_HOST
_comment: This is the host of your Redis server. You can get this from the Azure portal. Use SSL connection. Port should be provided. Example: my-redis.redis.cache.windows.net:6380

name: REDIS_PASSWORD
_comment: This is the password of your Redis server. You can get this from the Azure portal.
